title: Pixel 3 XL stuck in "Pixel is starting.." after OTA 11 update
content:
I just got the update to Android 11 on my Pixel 3 XL. It was a joyful moment. But only until the reboot happened. Ever since the phone is stuck in "Pixel is booting..." after entering the SIM Pin.

I tried waiting it out for about 2 hours, then rebootet, no change.
I then tried to sideload the ota image in revovery mode. It went through succesfully but after the reboot.. Again stuck at "Pixel is starting..."
I can still open the settings on the phone. But nothing more. So, what are my chances to fix this without factory reset? The beloved 2FA Apps don't like those resets.. :/

thanks in advance
